## Acknowledgements

### Quarto CLI

Quarto Wizard is built for the [Quarto CLI](https://quarto.org) ecosystem.
Special thanks to the Quarto team for creating such a powerful publishing system.

### Extension Registry

The extension registry is powered by [Quarto Extensions](https://m.canouil.dev/quarto-extensions/), which aggregates metadata from Quarto extensions across GitHub.

### Libraries and Tools

Quarto Wizard uses the following open-source libraries:

- [lodash](https://lodash.com/) - Utility library.
- [js-yaml](https://github.com/nodeca/js-yaml) - YAML parser.
- [semver](https://github.com/npm/node-semver) - Semantic versioning utilities.
- [VS Code Extension API](https://code.visualstudio.com/api) - Extension development framework.
